text: [Music]
the first step in building a whole
research community is making sure that
there are high quality curated data
available not just a one program or
group of researchers but to everybody
Allen Institute on their own can only do
so much and the whole idea is to put all
the data out there so that we can
leverage the whole entire neuroscience
community to use it for getting it out
for disaster response purposes we use it
for climate change research we use it
for education
AWS has been an essential partner with
space net simply just due to the size
and scale of the datasets that we are
open sourcing some of these datasets are
huge they're hundreds of terabytes or
petabytes in size and for a lot of
organizations they just can't process
them they can't use them at scale
without something like AWS we found that
without infrastructure it was super easy
to run a course anywhere in the world
just in the last three years our dataset
has been downloaded hundreds of millions
of times and over 79 countries that's
almost three hundred terabytes just in
the last year we could not do that
without AWS
[Music]
